advancements.wardentools.abyss.title: From the abyss
It looks sad... and so angry...
Kill a Warden and collect its heart.

advancements.wardentools.theabyss.descri: Jump into the void to reach the abyss.
advancements.wardentools.radiance.title: A glimmer of hope
advancements.wardentools.protector_invok: Let the darkness tremble in fear for once!
advancements.wardentools.protector.title: A Protector has risen again!
advancements.wardentools.protector.descr: Place a Protector Heart in an Invoker.

advancements.wardentools.corrupted.descr: Don't let it get to you!
advancements.wardentools.cristals.title: All that glitters
advancements.wardentools.escape.title: The gate of salvation.
advancements.wardentools.escape.descript: Use a Radiant Staff on a portal frame in an ancient city.

death.attack.corrupted.player: %1$s was consumed by the Corruption while fighting %2$s
message.wardentools.wind_task.7: Open the portal of an ancient city
message.wardentools.whisper.citrine_cave: = Citrine Cave =
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.3: Even the wind here listens to you.
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.4: If you listen very carefully, you might be able to hear the whispers of the Void.
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.5: Have you fallen here by chance ?
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.6: Where are you from ? Have you ever seen the light ?
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.7: There is an End to everything. But you have fallen here right before reaching it...
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.9: Would you really listen to the wind ?
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.1: How long have you been sneaking in the dark ?
Death is only another form of silence.
You really became a good listener.
You are free from the light here. Come and rest among the shadows.
There used to be people here. Only I can remember.
After all, you might have gotten too deep...
Do you know how the story ends ? I have seen an End once...
So it is true that you can hear us...
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.2: The sun hasn't shed a light on the wind for so long down here...
You remind me of someone I used to know...
The silence here... it's not empty.
I think you're not supposed to be here.
You don't belong here, but it doesn't matter.
It is hiding in the space between two silences...
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.3: What about jumping in the Void ?
No hope. No light. Only infinite nothingness, watched by aimless wardens.
I fly in the sky, I dive into caves, I hurl on the Void, and yet, you are more free than I will ever be.
The deeper you go, the quieter it gets.
message.wardentools.whisper.small_talk.4: What once lived here no longer remembers it.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.1: This world used to be noisy and peacefull. Now, it is silent and even more peacefull.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.2: The darkness of this world has gotten into yours, hasn't it ?
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.3: Do you think he will be able to find what used to make the beauty of this world ?
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.4: Who we are ? Some kind of ghosts I guess... But you are no different. You have seen it, don't you ? The Great Void ?
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.5: Were we alive some day ? I don't remember...
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.6: I couldn't imagine that the corruption would also reach the sky itself...
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.7: We thought knowledge would save us. It only opened the gate.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.8: The more they feared it, the more powerful it became.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.9: Their final ritual tore the earth open. That was the beginning of the end.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.10: We were warned. Over and over. We just refused to listen.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.11: The music held us together. It used to be joyful, but I like it also as it is now.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.12: Before it came, what we most fear was our best ally...
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.13: It turned our protectors against us... They became blind and angry. They couldn't listen to the music anymore. All they wanted to hear was screams.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.14: They began to worship the corrupted crystals. They began to worship the Void.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.15: Once the corruption took over, they created a Beast from it. An Incarnation of destruction.
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.16: Do you think he could perform the reactivation ritual ?
message.wardentools.whisper.lore.17: There was all sort of crystals, each with its own energy. But we tried to harvest the power of the forbidden one.
message.wardentools.whisper.ancient_cita: Soon after the incident, the contagion begun to rise from the depths.
They thought they could control it. They thought they could be safe in their underground Citadel.
Crystals were growing everywhere. They were beautiful, but they were also dangerous.
Entire cities would run thanks to the energy of the crystals.
They buried the catalyst under layers of fear and crystal.
The citadel had rules. The corruption had none.
The deeper halls were always off-limits. For a reason.
Slowly, all rules broke, fanaticism spread, and the corruption took over.
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.1: Some fell to the corruption, some fought it. Others adapted.
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.2: I don't remember those tree from back then...
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.3: Those plants look strange... But also, somehow alive... Is it reasuring ?
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.4: The grass might look ill, but it's safe to walk on it.
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.5: Avoid the sculk. It is everywhere. The most abject form of life
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.6: Are you sure you're gonna eat this fruit ?
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.7: To some extent, the sculk is the perfect form of life.
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.8: The sculk does not need water, food, or sun. It just feeds on death and void.
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.9: Those little lurker are cute, but their big eyes... I'm glad they can't see me.
message.wardentools.whisper.deepforest.1: You should try riding one those birds. You could experience a bit what it is to be me.
message.wardentools.whisper.white_forest: The trees are so white... It is so quiet...
It wasn't like this either before... Those trees are new
They grew as if they were fighting the corruption. Some sort of... immune system ?
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.1: I had not seen the light in so long!
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.2: We knew of its existence, but we were banished from this world.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.3: The air is pure. The world is young, mysterious, and vast. Let us explore together!
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.4: I see it now-our influence has reached these once-pristine lands.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.5: Everything seems so peaceful... Yet the corruption rumbles below.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.6: There is a way to end the Contagion. But we will not reveal it.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.7: A little further, I saw a fir tree! We once had firs, long ago...
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.8: They cannot hear me. Not yet. But their dreams shiver at my passing.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.9: Light used to burn me. Now, it brushes gently against me. What has become of me?
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.10: An ancient pact still binds me... But the surface offers me cracks.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.11: You breathe without thinking. I had forgotten such luxury.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.12: Every trembling leaf speaks louder than a thousand silent centuries.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.13: Your world still sings... despite all we have done.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.14: They thought they had sealed me away. But the air always finds a way.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.15: You walk upon soil that watched me fall. It welcomes you more than it did me.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.16: I remember the taste of rain. It no longer tastes the same.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.17: All of this is too loud. Too... alive.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.18: They chained me to silence. But the surface speaks to me once more.
message.wardentools.whisper.overworld.19: This world cherishes you. You do not yet understand the cost.
message.wardentools.whisper.crystal_cave: Some are so sharp, even I could cut myself !
They were used to create the first machines.
Everyone one of those crystals had a unique power.
I guess their power could still be harvested...
Some of those crystals weren't neutral at all.
If you listen carefully, you could here the black ones whispering promises of eternal life.
The white ones also promised something, but they were more about an eternal bliss.
If you want my opinion, none of the power crystals whispered anything good.
Each crystal you break changes the world just a little.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.1: The walls beat... like a red heart.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.2: Do you feel it too? The pulse beneath your feet.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.3: This place rewards those who do not tremble.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.4: Power listens. It waits for you to ask.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.5: Don't speak too loud. The crystals remember anger.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.6: I once saw a traveler strike the walls. The walls struck back.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.7: Power is a burden. Strength is a responsibility.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.8: Do you seek strength... or proof that you still exist?
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.9: They called these the Hearts of the Deep.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.10: Their light was born from fury and fire.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.11: They mined them until the mountains bled.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.12: Each shard still remembers the sound of war.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.13: Power was their prayer. Strength, their downfall.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.14: You are walking where kings kneeled, broken by their own will.
message.wardentools.whisper.ruby_cave.15: The next crystal awaits-the one of Mind. Few ever reach it without shattering first.
message.wardentools.whisper.citrine_cave: Do you hear them? Thoughts that waited before they belonged to you..
The air here tastes like memories.
Every crystal reflects what you think.
If you stop thinking, the whispers enters your mind.
Be careful what you imagine. It might take shape.
The wind here knows your name before you say it.
They used to meditate here, until the silence started answering back.
You think too much. The cave loves that.
Don't believe everything your mind tells you.
Isn't it beautiful? The way clarity can hurt.
This is where the ancients learned to elevate they minds.
This crystal brings the greatest clarity... but also the deepest madness.
The crystals of the Mind recorded every idea ever born here.
From these stones came peace treaties and weapons alike.
They built towers that reached the clouds and bridges that crossed time itself.
The citrine light never lies. It only reveals what you hide.
The greatest minds came here seeking truth. Most found madness.
They learned that intelligence is a mirror - sharp and endless.
From here, the path leads to Will. Thought must act, or die thinking.
message.wardentools.whisper.malachite_ca: It feels like the world itself holds its breath here.
The air stands still. Unmoving. Unyielding.
You've come far. Few ever reach the place where thought becomes will.
Can you feel it? That quiet certainty beneath your steps?
Do not falter. The stone listens for doubt.
The green light doesn't burn. It endures.
The silence here isn't peace. It's focus.
You walk among decisions that changed the world.
They forged their empires under this light.
Some called it virtue. Others, madness. Both were right, for Will does not suffer excuses, it only acts.
Malachite was the crystal of kings and conquerors.
Every shard here holds the weight of an unbroken promise.
They thought their will would save them. It only made their fall inevitable.
Determination shaped mountains, and buried empires beneath them.
The last of them stood here, facing oblivion, and refused to kneel.
After will comes silence. Beyond silence, only the dark remains.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.1: Did you hear that? It was your own voice... a few seconds too late.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.3: They still walk, the ones who never stopped.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.4: Don't call out. You might not like who answers.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.6: This darkness doesn't devour you. It echoes your material into a new life.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.7: You can almost hear their dreams dissolve.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.8: Every step you take adds another echo.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.9: I've been here before. Many times. Too many.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.10: Don't look back. There's nothing behind you - only reflections.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.11: The ancients came here seeking eternity. They found endless repetition.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.12: Each crystal is a memory trapped in stone.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.13: They thought death was the enemy. They never understood it was mercy.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.14: The plague was born when the echoes refused to fade.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.15: Nothing truly dies here. Nothing truly lives either.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.16: They called it eternal life, but it was eternal guilt looming.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.17: The darkness consumes, but it also cleanses.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.18: The echo is patient. It waits until all voices are quiet.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.19: Every spark of light needs a place to die. And in dying, it learns how to live again.
message.wardentools.whisper.echo_cave.20: Soon, the pale light will follow. Every shadow needs one last dawn.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.1: It's so bright... I can't see anything anymore.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.2: Every step feels like walking inside a dream.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.3: Do you feel it? The silence under the light.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.4: There's no place for shadow here. Not even your own.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.6: It looks peaceful... until you realize it never moves.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.7: You wanted truth. This is what it looks like.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.8: They thought they found paradise. It was only stillness.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.9: There is no pain here. No joy either.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.10: Too much light can blind even the sun.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.11: The ancients reached for purity. They found emptiness.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.12: They called it salvation. It was perfection without life.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.13: Light without shadow became a cage of glass.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.14: Even radiance can decay - not into darkness, but into stillness.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.15: The pale glow was never meant to be eternal. It was meant to fade and be born again.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.17: Only when shadow returned did the world remember how to breathe.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.18: From the fusion of light and dark came color, joy, and imperfection - the essence of life.
message.wardentools.whisper.pale_cave.19: The cycle ends here, and begins again. Balance is the only eternity.
message.wardentools.whisper.amethyst_cav: It feels... still. Like the world is holding its breath.
Not light. Not dark. Something between.
Did I missed something in this caves ?
The Ancient understood the nature of balance in the purple crystal, although they never seek it.
No warmth. No chill. Only quiet.
It doesn't call to me... it waits for you.
Everything here feels... complete, but unfinished.
Something about this place feels familiar. Like I've already been here.
The crystal hums softly, like it remembers more than it tells.
Peaceful... but not safe. It knows what's coming.
They say this was the first cave to awaken, and the last to sleep.
Every journey begins and ends in the same breath.
The purple light doesn't blind or guide. It simply watches, it waits for you to understand.
Here, even I, the wind, is uncertain whether to move.
The amethyst holds something the others lack - patience.
The ancients called it balance, though they didn't yet know why.
The stone hums softly, as if dreaming the world into being.
I wonder why this crystal is the only one who made it to the overworld...
book.wardentools.pilgrim_welcome:
Welcome humble pilgrim.

May your prayers be answered.

May the crystals guide you to light.
book.wardentools.amethyst_guidance:
Here you found balance.

It is the first step to strength.

Follow the path of the red crystal.
book.wardentools.crystal_psalm:
Crystals guide us.
Crystals teach us.
Crystals protect us.
In their light we thrive.
In their mercy we are sheltered.
In their wisdom we are humbled.
We live only to serve.
Our lives are theirs.
book.wardentools.ancient_citadel_hallway: The Great Unification is upon us.
Blessed be the dark radiance of the finished crystal.
The new Protector sits at the top. We worship its holy screams.
Crystals reveal eternity. We will conquer death.
Crystals are power. Crystals are light. Their brillance is tarnished only with truth.
